contents.text: Welcome to CircleCI in San Francisco, where we help teams rapidly release code they trust by automating their build, test, and delivery processes.
To speak with our sales and account management team, press 1.
To discuss new sales inquiries and pricing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team, a representative will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I need a quote for upgrading our team to the Performance plan
I’d like to get pricing details for a small development team subscription.
I’d like to discuss enterprise licensing and pricing tiers for high-availability CI/CD pipelines.
I need to talk to someone about setting up a new account and pricing
I’m exploring CircleCI plans for a student-run research project and need details on pricing and student discounts.

contents.text: For existing account management and billing questions, press 2.
One moment please, connecting you to our account management team now.

navigationGoals: I need to resolve a billing error on our latest invoice
I need help understanding and updating the billing on my existing CircleCI account.
I need to update my payment method and review my current subscription usage metrics.
I want help understanding the charges on my current bill
I need to update my billing information and clarify the charges from my last invoice.

contents.text: If you’re experiencing build or deployment issues, press 1.
Please hold while we transfer you to a build and deployment engineer.

navigationGoals: My build is failing and I need an engineer to troubleshoot it
My build pipelines are failing with a Docker image error, and I need technical support.
I’m troubleshooting a failing CI pipeline due to Docker layer caching errors in our Kubernetes deployments.
My code builds are failing and I need assistance fixing them
My recent build of my physics simulation code failed—I need help debugging the build pipeline.

contents.text: For assistance with integrations or our API, press 2.
Just a moment please, connecting you to our integrations and API support team.

navigationGoals: I need help integrating CircleCI’s API into our CI pipeline
I want assistance setting up the GitHub Enterprise integration via the CircleCI API.
I need assistance configuring the CircleCI API for custom webhooks to trigger downstream microservices.
I need help connecting CircleCI with my other tools via the API
I want guidance on using the CircleCI API to automate my data analysis workflow integration.
